verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> on Neginoth <WH5058> upon Sheminith <WH8067>, A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. O YY <WH3068>, rebuke <WH3198> <WH8686> me not in thine anger <WH639>, neither chasten <WH3256> <WH8762> me in thy hot displeasure <WH2534>.
Have mercy <WH2603> <WH8798> upon me, O YY <WH3068>; for I am weak <WH536>: O YY <WH3068>, heal <WH7495> <WH8798> me; for my bones <WH6106> are vexed <WH926> <WH8738>.
My soul <WH5315> is also sore <WH3966> vexed <WH926> <WH8738>: but thou, O YY <WH3068>, how long?
Return <WH7725> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>, deliver <WH2502> <WH8761> my soul <WH5315>: oh save <WH3467> <WH8685> me for thy mercies <WH2617> ' sake.
For in death <WH4194> there is no remembrance <WH2143> of thee: in the grave <WH7585> who shall give thee thanks <WH3034> <WH8686> ?
I am weary <WH3021> <WH8804> with my groaning <WH585>; all the night <WH3915> make I my bed <WH4296> to swim <WH7811> <WH8686>; I water <WH4529> <WH8686> my couch <WH6210> with my tears <WH1832>.
Mine eye <WH5869> is consumed <WH6244> <WH8804> because of grief <WH3708>; it waxeth old <WH6275> <WH8804> because of all mine enemies <WH6887> <WH8802>.
Depart <WH5493> <WH8798> from me, all ye workers <WH6466> <WH8802> of iniquity <WH205>; for the YY <WH3068> hath heard <WH8085> <WH8804> the voice <WH6963> of my weeping <WH1065>.
The YY <WH3068> hath heard <WH8085> <WH8804> my supplication <WH8467>; the YY <WH3068> will receive <WH3947> <WH8799> my prayer <WH8605>.
Let all mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799> and sore <WH3966> vexed <WH926> <WH8735>: let them return <WH7725> <WH8799> and be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799> suddenly <WH7281>.
